$interpreted: Angelia: So, am I to understand that this narcotic that's sending innocent people into comas...
Angelia: "Spring dust"... is being smuggled in from Hot Spring Street in the East?
Sione: Affirmative! According to the confession we've heard—
Sione: The dealers are extremely cautious. Their identity remains unknown. The next transaction is expected to take place... at a competition being organized by the hot spring hotel.
Dylan: We've heard that guests from far and wide will be gathering there during those few days. It's the perfect opportunity for somebody to move around undetected.
Angelia: ...and the perfect opportunity for us to catch them, too.
Angelia: Captain Dylan, I'm afraid you'll be temporarily indisposed for the moment, and unable to deal with this drug-smuggling operation. Therefore—
Angelia: Sione, I'm appointing you Special Investigator for this case.
Angelia: —Go to the East, and find out who's responsible for this!
Yao: So, it's all going down at the Spring Waters Hotel. What can you tell us about the seller?
Official Witness: Oh! I once got a glimpse of a purple scar covering her face? It was revolting, I'll never forget that~ There wasn't anything else of interest...
Official Witness: Kyaah!—Owowowow...
Yao: Don't test my patience, unless you're looking out for a nasty ending. Keep talking!
Official Witness: Hah!? How dare you threaten me, you—you—you scallywag!
Official Witness: All I did was buy a little powder to enhance my soak in the onsen, what's the big deal!? What I get up to during my hot spring time is my own business!
Yao: ...You lowlife.
Yao: ………
Yao: Oops, didn't mean to do that. I guess he can count himself lucky.
Nolva: *yawn*... Did I doze off again? Where am I...
Yao: Quit blocking the road.
Nolva: S-s-sorry, it wasn't on purpose! It's my first time in the East, I've been staring at a map all day and can't help nodding off...
Nolva: (This guy's expression... H-he's so fierce..)
Nolva: (Kittyeyes and the others used to say you should never try to outbrawn a rogue... I should get to somewhere with other people around, pronto—)
Yao: Where are you going?
Nolva: I'm s-sorry, I'm not running from you! I'll give you all my money... Just don't hurt me, p-please...
Yao: What are you crying for? I'm just asking you your destination.
Nolva: What?
Nolva: I'm going to the Spring Waters Hotel... by the Limpid River...
Yao: Spring Waters?
Yao: I see... The more beautiful things appear on the surface, the more rotten they are underneath.
Yao: You'd best remember that. Stay frosty.
Nolva: What's that supposed to mean...?
Yao: ………
Yao: Just try to keep up with me.
Nolva: (—Is this guy... accompanying me now!? Maybe he's not as bad as I imagined...)
Yao: Move it. No time to waste.
Nolva: Yessir! Th-thank you... Thank you so much...!
Nolva: Spring—Waters—Hotel—So this onsen is the one the guidebook gives its highest recommendation to?
Nolva: (It's that herb that Doctor Aosta said would help me communicate with Waverlyde... What's it doing, growing in a beautiful place like this...)
Nolva: Huh? Mister...?
Nolva: He's gone... I didn't even have time to ask his name, nevermind thank him...

Model.Text: So, am I to understand that this narcotic that's sending innocent people into comas...
"Spring dust"... is being smuggled in from Hot Spring Street in the East?
Affirmative! According to the confession we've heard—
The dealers are extremely cautious. Their identity remains unknown. The next transaction is expected to take place... at a competition being organized by the hot spring hotel.
We've heard that guests from far and wide will be gathering there during those few days. It's the perfect opportunity for somebody to move around undetected.
...and the perfect opportunity for us to catch them, too.
Captain Dylan, I'm afraid you'll be temporarily indisposed for the moment, and unable to deal with this drug-smuggling operation. Therefore—
Sione, I'm appointing you Special Investigator for this case.
—Go to the East, and find out who's responsible for this!
So, it's all going down at the Spring Waters Hotel. What can you tell us about the seller?
Oh! I once got a glimpse of a purple scar covering her face? It was revolting, I'll never forget that~ There wasn't anything else of interest...
Kyaah!—Owowowow...
Don't test my patience, unless you're looking out for a nasty ending. Keep talking!
Hah!? How dare you threaten me, you—you—you scallywag!
All I did was buy a little powder to enhance my soak in the onsen, what's the big deal!? What I get up to during my hot spring time is my own business!
...You lowlife.
Oops, didn't mean to do that. I guess he can count himself lucky.
*yawn*... Did I doze off again? Where am I...
Quit blocking the road.
S-s-sorry, it wasn't on purpose! It's my first time in the East, I've been staring at a map all day and can't help nodding off...
(This guy's expression... H-he's so fierce..)
(Kittyeyes and the others used to say you should never try to outbrawn a rogue... I should get to somewhere with other people around, pronto—)
Where are you going?
I'm s-sorry, I'm not running from you! I'll give you all my money... Just don't hurt me, p-please...
What are you crying for? I'm just asking you your destination.
What?
I'm going to the Spring Waters Hotel... by the Limpid River...
Spring Waters?
I see... The more beautiful things appear on the surface, the more rotten they are underneath.
You'd best remember that. Stay frosty.
What's that supposed to mean...?
Just try to keep up with me.
(—Is this guy... accompanying me now!? Maybe he's not as bad as I imagined...)
Move it. No time to waste.
Yessir! Th-thank you... Thank you so much...!
Spring—Waters—Hotel—So this onsen is the one the guidebook gives its highest recommendation to?
(It's that herb that Doctor Aosta said would help me communicate with Waverlyde... What's it doing, growing in a beautiful place like this...)
Huh? Mister...?
He's gone... I didn't even have time to ask his name, nevermind thank him...
